dcterms:description: A game-theoretic approach to strategy generation for moving target defense in web applications, including four states representing different configurations of the system and three attacker types with specific actions.
dcterms:title: Moving Target Defense (MTD) for Web-Applications

dcterms:creator: Sailik Sengupta
Ankur Chowdhary
Dijiang Huang
Subbarao Kambhampati
dcterms:description: A General-Sum Markov Game for strategic detection of advanced persistent threats using moving target defense in cloud networks, involving four states and a specific set of actions related to intrusion detection systems.
dcterms:title: Moving Target Defense (MTD) for Cloud-Network Security
